propDescriptions.className: className applied to the root component.
propDescriptions.clearable: If true, it shows the clear action in the picker dialog.
propDescriptions.dateAdapter: Allows to pass configured date-io adapter directly. More info here jsx dateAdapter={new AdapterDateFns({ locale: ruLocale })}
propDescriptions.disableCloseOnSelect: If true the popup or dialog will immediately close after submitting full date.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the picker and text field are disabled.
propDescriptions.disableMaskedInput: Disable mask on the keyboard, this should be used rarely. Consider passing proper mask for your format.
propDescriptions.disableOpenPicker: Do not render open picker button (renders only text field with validation).
propDescriptions.getOpenDialogAriaText: Get aria-label text for control that opens picker dialog. Aria-label text must include selected date. @DateIOType
propDescriptions.InputAdornmentProps: Props to pass to keyboard input adornment.
propDescriptions.mask: Custom mask. Can be used to override generate from format. (e.g. //__ __: or //__ __: _M)
propDescriptions.onAccept: Callback fired when date is accepted @DateIOType.
propDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when the value (the selected date) changes @DateIOType.
propDescriptions.onClose: Callback fired when the popup requests to be closed. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.onError:
Callback that fired when input value or new value prop validation returns new validation error (or value is valid after error). In case of validation error detected reason prop return non-null value and TextField must be displayed in error state. This can be used to render appropriate form error.
Read the guide about form integration and error displaying.
propDescriptions.onOpen: Callback fired when the popup requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.open: Control the popup or dialog open state.
propDescriptions.OpenPickerButtonProps: Props to pass to keyboard adornment button.
propDescriptions.openPickerIcon: Icon displaying for open picker button.
propDescriptions.renderInput: The renderInput prop allows you to customize the rendered input. The props argument of this render prop contains props of TextField that you need to forward. Pay specific attention to the ref and inputProps keys.
propDescriptions.rifmFormatter: Custom formatter to be passed into Rifm component.
propDescriptions.showTodayButton: If true, the today button is displayed. Note that showClearButton has a higher priority.
propDescriptions.showToolbar: If true, show the toolbar even in desktop mode.
propDescriptions.ToolbarComponent: Component that will replace default toolbar renderer.
propDescriptions.toolbarFormat: Date format, that is displaying in toolbar.
propDescriptions.toolbarPlaceholder: Mobile picker date value placeholder, displaying if value === null.
propDescriptions.toolbarTitle: Mobile picker title, displaying in the toolbar.
